greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = ceiling(GPF(n)/LPF(n)) where GPF is greatest prime factor, LPF is least prime factor.
comment: Given GPF(n) and LPF(n), the sum is A074320, the difference is A046665 and the product is A066048. a(n) = 1 iff n is p^k iff n is in A000961.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
maple: A120454 := proc(n) local ifs ; if n = 1 then RETURN(1) ; else ifs := ifactors(n)[2] ; RETURN( ceil(op(1,op(-1,ifs))/op(1,op(1,ifs))) ) ; fi ; end ; for n from 1 to 100 do printf("%d, ",A120454(n)) ; od ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 16 2006
program: (PARI) A120454(n) = if(1==n,1, my(f = factor(n), lpf = f[1, 1], gpf = f[#f~, 1]); ceil(gpf/lpf)); \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 06 2018
results.author: _Jonathan Vos Post_, Aug 16 2006
ext: Corrected and extended by _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 16 2006
